trans-unit.source: PyLogBeatClient.send() accepts a sequence (list, tuple, set) of "messages". The messages itself can either be a dict object representing the final message to be sent to Logstash or a bytes or string object which must contain properly formatted JSON. If a dict is passed as element, it is converted to JSON using json.dumps().
trans-unit.target: PyLogBeatClient.send() accepts a sequence (list, tuple, set) of "messages". The messages itself can either be a dict object representing the final message to be sent to Logstash or a bytes or string object which must contain properly formatted JSON . If a dict is passed as element, it is converted to JSON using json.dumps() .

trans-unit.source: Due to a bug (https://github.com/logstash-plugins/logstash-input-beats/pull/342) in some Logstash versions, you will need Logstash >= 5.6.12 or Logstash >= 6.4.0.
trans-unit.target: Due to a bug (https://github.com/logstash-plugins/logstash-input-beats/pull/342) in some Logstash versions, you will need Logstash >= 5.6.12 or Logstash >= 6.4.0.

trans-unit.source: Found a bug or got a feature request? Please report it at https://github.com/eht16/pylogbeat/issues.
trans-unit.target: Found a bug or got a feature request? Please report it at https://github.com/eht16/pylogbeat/issues.

trans-unit.source: Furthermore, PyLogBeatClient's constructor method takes a use_logging argument which should be a boolean indicating whether the logging subsystem should be used at all. The argument defaults to False, i.e. if you want any logging, you need to pass True. If PyLogBeat is used itself as part of the logging system (e.g. as the transport of a handler), it is important to not emit any new log messages once the logging subsystem has been shutdown or is in the process of shutting down. In this case, use_logging must be False in order to suppress generating log messages.
trans-unit.target: Furthermore, PyLogBeatClient's constructor method takes a use_logging argument which should be a boolean indicating whether the logging subsystem should be used at all. The argument defaults to False , i.e. if you want any logging, you need to pass True . If PyLogBeat is used itself as part of the logging system (e.g. as the transport of a handler), it is important to not emit any new log messages once the logging subsystem has been shutdown or is in the process of shutting down. In this case, use_logging must be False in order to suppress generating log messages.

trans-unit.source: If you are interested in the code, want to improve it and/or complete the protocol support, please feel free to send PRs. I would be happy if someone likes to continue developing this library and would also take full maintainership for future development and releases.
trans-unit.target: コードに興味のある方、改良したい方、プロトコルサポートを完成させたい方は、気軽にPRを送ってください。誰かがこのライブラリの開発を続けてくれると嬉しいですし、将来の開発やリリースのために完全なメンテナシップを取ってくれると嬉しいです。

trans-unit.source: PyLogBeat is a simple, incomplete implementation of the Beats protocol used by Elastic Beats and Logstash. For more information about Beats see https://www.elastic.co/products/beats and https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/logstash/current/plugins-inputs-beats.html.
trans-unit.target: PyLogBeat is a simple, incomplete implementation of the Beats protocol used by Elastic Beats and Logstash. For more information about Beats see https://www.elastic.co/products/beats and https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/logstash/current/plugins-inputs-beats.html.

trans-unit.source: PyLogBeat is licensed under the Apache License 2.0.
trans-unit.target: PyLogBeat は Apache License 2.0 の下でライセンスされています。

trans-unit.source: PyLogBeat uses a logger named "pylogbeat" to log some debug messages and warnings in case of errors. By default, the logger's log level is set to Warning so you will not see any debug log messages. If necessary simply change the log level of the logger to see the debug messages. For example:
trans-unit.target: PyLogBeat uses a logger named "pylogbeat" to log some debug messages and warnings in case of errors. By default, the logger's log level is set to Warning so you will not see any debug log messages. If necessary simply change the log level of the logger to see the debug messages. For example:
シンプルな使い方

trans-unit.source: Simple, incomplete implementation of the Beats protocol used by Elastic Beats and Logstash.
trans-unit.target: Elastic BeatsやLogstashで使われているBeatsプロトコルのシンプルで不完全な実装。

trans-unit.source: The easiest method is to install directly from pypi using pip:
trans-unit.target: 一番簡単な方法は、pipを使ってpypiから直接インストールすることです。

trans-unit.source: The following example is a message as JSON:
trans-unit.target: The following example is a message as JSON :

trans-unit.source: The implemented Beats protocol is not yet officially specified and documented, unfortunately. Hopefully the Beats developers will provide a specification in the future. So far, sending the data and waiting for the ACK from the server is implemented. But there might some details from the protocol missing in the implementation.
trans-unit.target: 実装されているBeatsプロトコルは、残念ながらまだ正式には規定されておらず、文書化されていません。願わくば、Beatsの開発者が将来的に仕様書を提供してくれることを期待しています。今のところ、データを送信してサーバーからのACKを待つというのが実装されています。しかし、実装されていない部分があるかもしれません。

trans-unit.source: The main difference to other transport mechanisms like direct TCP or UDP transfer is that with the Beats protocol there is a higher reliability of the data transfer, especially since the server acknowledges the data it received so the client knows whether and what to resend.
trans-unit.target: ダイレクトTCPやUDP転送のような他のトランスポートメカニズムとの主な違いは、Beatsプロトコルの方がデータ転送の信頼性が高いということです。

trans-unit.source: The source code is available at https://github.com/eht16/pylogbeat/.
trans-unit.target: The source code is available at https://github.com/eht16/pylogbeat/.

trans-unit.source: This code is based on https://github.com/brxie/PyLumberjack and adopted to support version 2 of the protocol. Thanks to brxie for the initial code.
trans-unit.target: This code is based on https://github.com/brxie/PyLumberjack and adopted to support version 2 of the protocol. Thanks to brxie for the initial code.

trans-unit.target: これはJSONの標準的なLogstashメッセージフォーマットです。

trans-unit.source: With this library it is possible to send log messages or any data to Logstash' beats input plugin or any other service which implements the Beats protocol.
trans-unit.target: このライブラリを使うと、ログメッセージやデータをLogstashのbeats入力プラグインやBeatsプロトコルを実装した他のサービスに送信することができます。
